doc.title: 26/71: Zeichenfilm - Balzac und das Auge Gottes
doc.plot: In crude, hand-drawn animation, Balzac und das Auge Gottes evokes the scatological, sadomasochistic actions and performances of Otto Muehl and Günter Brus. (Regina Cornwell)
In crude, hand-drawn animation, Balzac und das Auge Gottes evokes the scatological, sadomasochistic actions and performances of Otto Muehl and Günter Brus. (Regina Cornwell)
